plot: A gift in the wrong hands turns into a nightmare for all who come in contact with it. Evil turns love into a deadly game for those who should have left well enough alone.
title: Pen
plot_es: A gift in the wrong hands turns into a nightmare for all who come in contact with it. Evil turns love into a deadly game for those who should have left well enough alone.
